desc: ErgoFlip is the world’s first 2 seats in 1 ergonomic active office chair, designed to reduce the negative consequences of prolonged static sitting, and promote increased lumbopelvic. Can reduce pain with prolonged sitting in people who already have lower back pain.

layout.text: The World's First 2-in-1 Active Office Chair
Aching for freedom while at your desk? It’s time to change the way you sit.
